response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. This price reflects not only the cost of production and market value but also our commitment to ensuring you receive a high-quality solution tailored to your needs. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further details.", "product_price": 12000}
